A pointer to an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/OSString] containing the UID.

# GetUID

**Instance Method**

Gets the unique identifier of the clock device.

## Declaration

```swift
OSSharedPtr<OSString> GetUID();
```

## Return Value

A pointer to an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/OSString] containing the UID.

## Discussion

This method synchronizes by using the work queue created by the object.
title: GetUID
